checkCertificateValidity.title: Check certificate validity
checkCertificateValidity.description: Check if the certificate used to sign the JWT is valid with correct 'not_before' and 'not_after' dates.

checkCertificateRevocation.title: Check if the certificate is revoked
checkCertificateRevocation.description: Check if the certificate used to sign the JWT is not revoked via the CRL Distribution Points. The CRL is stored inside the X509v3 CRL Distribution Extension Points.
